storyTitle: As Manager, I want to modify employee schedules to achieve flexible workforce management

testCases.title: Modify an assigned shift without conflicts
preconditions: Manager is logged into the system with valid credentials
Manager has role-based access permissions for schedule management
At least one employee has an assigned shift in the system
The target shift to be modified exists and is not in the past
No conflicting shifts exist for the selected time slot

steps.action: Navigate to the employee schedule management page from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Employee schedule management page loads successfully and displays a list of all scheduled shifts with employee names, dates, and shift times

steps.action: Locate and select a specific shift from the schedule list by clicking on it
steps.expectedResult: Shift details are displayed and an edit option/button becomes available

steps.action: Click the edit button to open the shift modification form
steps.expectedResult: Edit shift form opens displaying current shift details including date, time, shift template, and employee assignment

steps.action: Modify the shift details by changing the date and/or shift template to a non-conflicting time slot
steps.expectedResult: Form accepts the changes without displaying any validation errors or conflict warnings

steps.action: Click the submit/save button to apply the modification
steps.expectedResult: System processes the modification, shift is updated successfully in the database, and a confirmation message is displayed stating 'Shift updated successfully'

steps.action: Verify the updated shift appears in the schedule list with the new details
steps.expectedResult: Schedule list refreshes and displays the modified shift with updated date and time information

steps.action: Check that notifications have been sent to the affected employee and relevant managers
steps.expectedResult: System confirms notifications were sent via email and in-app alerts to all affected parties

postconditions: Shift is updated in the EmployeeSchedules database with new details
Audit log entry is created with manager ID, timestamp, and modification details
Notifications are sent to the affected employee and managers
Schedule list reflects the updated shift information
No scheduling conflicts exist in the system

testCases.title: Cancel an assigned shift with reason
preconditions: Manager is logged into the system with valid credentials
Manager has role-based access permissions for schedule management
At least one employee has an assigned shift that can be cancelled
The shift to be cancelled is not already cancelled
Email and in-app notification systems are operational

steps.action: Navigate to the employee schedule management page
steps.expectedResult: Schedule management page loads and displays all scheduled shifts

steps.action: Select a scheduled shift to cancel by clicking on it
steps.expectedResult: Shift details are displayed with available actions including a cancel option

steps.action: Click the cancel shift button
steps.expectedResult: Cancellation form is displayed with a mandatory reason input field and confirmation/cancel buttons

steps.action: Enter a valid cancellation reason in the reason input field (e.g., 'Employee requested time off')
steps.expectedResult: Text is accepted in the reason field without errors, and the field shows the entered text

steps.action: Click the confirm cancellation button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the cancellation, shift status is updated to cancelled, and a confirmation message is displayed stating 'Shift cancelled successfully'

steps.action: Verify the cancelled shift is marked as cancelled in the schedule list
steps.expectedResult: Schedule list updates and the shift is displayed with a cancelled status indicator and the cancellation reason is visible

steps.action: Check email inbox for the affected employee
steps.expectedResult: Email notification is received by the employee containing shift cancellation details and reason

steps.action: Check in-app notifications for the affected employee
steps.expectedResult: In-app notification is present in the employee's notification center with cancellation details

steps.action: Verify notification sent to manager
steps.expectedResult: Manager receives confirmation notification via email and in-app alert confirming the shift cancellation

postconditions: Shift status is updated to cancelled in the EmployeeSchedules database
Cancellation reason is stored with the shift record
Audit log entry is created with manager ID, timestamp, cancellation reason, and change details
Email notifications are delivered to employee and manager
In-app notifications are delivered to employee and manager
Cancelled shift is visible in schedule with cancelled status

testCases.title: Verify audit logging of schedule modifications
preconditions: Manager is logged into the system with valid credentials
Manager has role-based access permissions for schedule management and audit log access
At least one scheduled shift exists that can be modified or cancelled
Audit logging system is enabled and operational
Manager's user ID and timestamp information are available in the system

steps.action: Navigate to the employee schedule management page
steps.expectedResult: Schedule management page loads successfully displaying all scheduled shifts

steps.action: Select a scheduled shift and modify its details (change date or time) or cancel it with a reason
steps.expectedResult: Modification or cancellation is processed successfully and confirmation message is displayed

steps.action: Note the specific details of the modification including the shift ID, old values, new values, and the exact time of modification
steps.expectedResult: Modification details are visible in the confirmation message or schedule view

steps.action: Navigate to the audit log section or access audit logs for the specific schedule
steps.expectedResult: Audit log interface loads successfully showing a list of recent schedule modifications

steps.action: Search or filter the audit log for the recently modified shift using shift ID or employee name
steps.expectedResult: Audit log displays the relevant entry for the modified shift

steps.action: Verify the audit log entry contains the manager's user ID who performed the modification
steps.expectedResult: Log entry displays the correct manager user ID matching the logged-in manager

steps.action: Verify the audit log entry contains an accurate timestamp of when the modification occurred
steps.expectedResult: Timestamp in the log entry matches the time when the modification was performed (within acceptable system time variance)

steps.action: Verify the audit log entry contains complete change details including old values and new values
steps.expectedResult: Log entry shows before and after values for all modified fields (e.g., old date/time vs new date/time, or cancellation reason)

steps.action: Confirm the log entry includes the action type (modification or cancellation)
steps.expectedResult: Log entry clearly indicates whether the action was an edit/modification or a cancellation

steps.action: Verify log accuracy by comparing all logged details with the actual modification performed
steps.expectedResult: All log details (user ID, timestamp, old values, new values, action type) accurately match the performed modification with 100% accuracy

postconditions: Audit log entry exists in the AuditLogs database
Log entry contains complete and accurate information about the schedule modification
Log entry includes manager user ID, timestamp, action type, and change details
Audit trail maintains 100% coverage for the schedule change
Log entry is immutable and cannot be altered
Audit log is accessible for future compliance and reporting purposes

storyTitle: As Employee, I want to view my assigned schedule to achieve awareness of my work shifts

testCases.title: View assigned schedule for logged-in employee
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials in the system
Employee has at least one assigned shift in the EmployeeSchedules database
System authentication and authorization services are operational
Employee's schedule data is up-to-date and accurate
Schedule viewing page loads within 2 seconds performance requirement

steps.action: Navigate to the system login page and enter valid employee credentials (username and password)
steps.expectedResult: Login is successful and employee is authenticated

steps.action: Verify the employee dashboard is displayed after successful login
steps.expectedResult: Dashboard loads successfully showing employee-specific menu options and navigation elements

steps.action: Locate and click on the 'My Schedule' navigation link or menu item
steps.expectedResult: 'My Schedule' page loads within 2 seconds displaying the employee's personal schedule interface

steps.action: Verify the schedule page displays assigned shifts for the current date range (default view)
steps.expectedResult: Schedule page shows all assigned shifts for the employee with dates, times, and shift information clearly visible in list or calendar view

steps.action: Select or click on a specific shift to view detailed information
steps.expectedResult: Shift details panel or modal opens displaying comprehensive information

steps.action: Verify shift details include start time information
steps.expectedResult: Start time is displayed accurately in the correct time format (e.g., 9:00 AM)

steps.action: Verify shift details include end time information
steps.expectedResult: End time is displayed accurately in the correct time format (e.g., 5:00 PM)

steps.action: Verify shift details include break time information
steps.expectedResult: Break times and duration are displayed correctly (e.g., 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM, 1 hour lunch break)

steps.action: Verify all displayed shift information matches the actual assigned schedule in the database
steps.expectedResult: All shift times, dates, and break information are 100% accurate and match the EmployeeSchedules data source

steps.action: Test date range selection by choosing a different date range (e.g., next week or next month)
steps.expectedResult: Schedule updates to display shifts for the selected date range accurately

postconditions: Employee remains logged into the system
Schedule data is displayed accurately without modifications
No unauthorized access to other employees' schedules occurred
System performance met the 2-second load time requirement
Employee can continue to navigate to other sections of the application

steps.expectedResult: Email notification is received containing the schedule change details including old shift information, new shift information, date of change, and who made the change

steps.action: Verify the email notification content is accurate and complete
steps.expectedResult: Email contains all relevant details: employee name, old schedule, new schedule, modification date/time, and manager who made the change

steps.action: Employee logs into the system
steps.expectedResult: Employee successfully logs in and dashboard is displayed

steps.action: Check the in-app notification center or notification icon
steps.expectedResult: In-app notification is present indicating a schedule change with a notification badge or indicator

steps.action: Click on the in-app notification to view details
steps.expectedResult: Notification details are displayed showing the schedule change information including old and new shift details

steps.action: Navigate to 'My Schedule' page from the notification or main menu
steps.expectedResult: 'My Schedule' page loads successfully

steps.action: Verify the schedule displays the updated shift information
steps.expectedResult: Schedule reflects the latest changes made by the manager with accurate new date, time, and shift details

steps.action: Confirm the old shift is no longer displayed or is marked as modified
steps.expectedResult: Old shift information is replaced with new shift details, and schedule shows current accurate information

postconditions: Employee's schedule is updated in the system with the latest changes
Email notification is delivered and stored in employee's email inbox
In-app notification is marked as delivered in the notification system
Employee is aware of the schedule change through multiple notification channels
Notification delivery meets the 95% timely delivery success metric
Audit log contains record of the notification being sent

testCases.title: Export schedule to calendar format
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system with valid credentials
Employee has at least one assigned shift in their schedule
Employee has navigated to the 'My Schedule' page
Export functionality is enabled and operational
Employee's browser allows file downloads
Employee has a personal calendar application available (e.g., Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar)

steps.action: On the 'My Schedule' page, locate and click the export schedule button or option
steps.expectedResult: Export options menu or dialog is displayed showing available calendar format options

steps.action: Review the available export format options (e.g., iCal/ICS, CSV, Google Calendar)
steps.expectedResult: Multiple common calendar format options are displayed and selectable

steps.action: Select a preferred calendar format (e.g., iCal/ICS format) from the available options
steps.expectedResult: Selected format is highlighted or marked as chosen

steps.action: Click the confirm export or download button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the export request and initiates file download

steps.action: Verify the schedule file is downloaded to the local device
steps.expectedResult: File is successfully downloaded with appropriate filename (e.g., 'my_schedule.ics') and appears in the browser's download location

steps.action: Check the downloaded file size and format
steps.expectedResult: File has a valid size (greater than 0 bytes) and correct file extension matching the selected format

steps.action: Open the personal calendar application (e.g., Google Calendar, Outlook)
steps.expectedResult: Calendar application launches successfully

steps.action: Use the calendar application's import function to import the downloaded schedule file
steps.expectedResult: Calendar application recognizes the file format and initiates the import process without errors

steps.action: Complete the import process in the calendar application
steps.expectedResult: Import completes successfully and confirmation message is displayed in the calendar application

steps.action: Navigate to the date range where shifts were scheduled in the calendar application
steps.expectedResult: Calendar displays the imported shifts on the correct dates

steps.action: Verify each imported shift shows correct start time, end time, and shift details
steps.expectedResult: All shift information is correctly imported and displayed including accurate start times, end times, break information, and any additional shift details

steps.action: Compare the imported calendar entries with the original schedule in the system
steps.expectedResult: All shifts from the employee's schedule are present in the calendar with 100% accuracy and no missing or incorrect entries

postconditions: Schedule file is successfully downloaded to employee's device
Schedule is imported into employee's personal calendar application
All shift information is accurately reflected in the personal calendar
Employee can view their work schedule in their personal calendar alongside personal appointments
Original schedule in the system remains unchanged
Export action may be logged in system audit trail

storyTitle: As Manager, I want to generate reports on shift coverage to achieve optimized workforce planning

testCases.title: Generate shift coverage report for a date range
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role
At least one department exists in the system
Employee schedules exist for the selected date range
User has permission to access reporting section

steps.action: Navigate to the reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Reporting page loads successfully and displays available report options including shift coverage, employee hours, and scheduling conflicts

steps.action: Select 'Shift Coverage Report' from the report type dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Shift coverage report form is displayed with date range and department filter options

steps.action: Enter start date in the 'From Date' field (e.g., 01/01/2024)
steps.expectedResult: Start date is accepted and displayed in the correct format

steps.action: Enter end date in the 'To Date' field (e.g., 01/31/2024)
steps.expectedResult: End date is accepted and displayed in the correct format

steps.action: Select a department from the department filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Department is selected and displayed in the filter field

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button
steps.expectedResult: Report generation begins and a loading indicator is displayed

steps.action: Wait for report to complete generation
steps.expectedResult: Report is generated within 5 seconds and displays shift coverage data including employee names, shift dates, shift times, total hours, and coverage status for the specified date range and department

steps.action: Verify the accuracy of displayed data by cross-referencing with known schedule entries
steps.expectedResult: All data in the report matches the actual employee schedules in the system with 100% accuracy

postconditions: Shift coverage report is displayed on screen
Report data is accurate and matches database records
Report generation is logged in the system
User remains on the reporting page

testCases.title: Export report to PDF and Excel
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role
A shift coverage report has been successfully generated and is displayed on screen
User has appropriate file download permissions
Browser allows file downloads

steps.action: Verify that a shift coverage report is currently displayed on the screen
steps.expectedResult: Report is visible with complete data including shift coverage information, employee hours, and any identified conflicts

steps.action: Locate and click the 'Export to PDF' button in the report toolbar
steps.expectedResult: PDF export process initiates and a download dialog appears or file automatically downloads to the default download location

steps.action: Navigate to the download location and open the downloaded PDF file
steps.expectedResult: PDF file opens successfully and contains all report data with proper formatting, headers, and footers. Data matches the on-screen report exactly

steps.action: Return to the report page and locate the 'Export to Excel' button in the report toolbar
steps.expectedResult: Export to Excel button is visible and clickable

steps.action: Click the 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: Excel export process initiates and a download dialog appears or file automatically downloads to the default download location

steps.action: Navigate to the download location and open the downloaded Excel file
steps.expectedResult: Excel file opens successfully in spreadsheet application and contains all report data in a structured format with proper columns and rows. Data matches the on-screen report exactly and is editable

steps.action: Verify that both exported files contain the same data as displayed in the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: PDF and Excel files both contain identical data matching the original report with no data loss or corruption

postconditions: PDF file is successfully downloaded and contains accurate report data
Excel file is successfully downloaded and contains accurate report data
Both files are accessible in the download location
Original report remains displayed on screen
Export actions are logged in the system

testCases.title: Verify report highlights uncovered shifts
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role
Test data includes at least one uncovered shift in the system
Test data includes at least one scheduling conflict
Date range for testing encompasses the uncovered shifts and conflicts

steps.action: Navigate to the reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Reporting page loads successfully and displays available report options

steps.action: Select 'Shift Coverage Report' and specify a date range that includes known uncovered shifts
steps.expectedResult: Report parameters are accepted and date range is set correctly

steps.action: Select the department that contains uncovered shifts
steps.expectedResult: Department filter is applied successfully

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' button
steps.expectedResult: Report is generated within 5 seconds and displays on screen

steps.action: Scan the report for visual indicators of uncovered shifts (e.g., highlighted rows, warning icons, or color coding)
steps.expectedResult: Uncovered shifts are clearly highlighted using distinct visual indicators such as red highlighting, warning icons, or bold text that differentiate them from covered shifts

steps.action: Review the details of each highlighted uncovered shift
steps.expectedResult: Each uncovered shift displays complete information including shift date, shift time, required position, and clear indication that no employee is assigned

steps.action: Locate the scheduling conflicts section or indicators in the report
steps.expectedResult: Scheduling conflicts are clearly identified with visual indicators such as yellow highlighting, conflict icons, or specific conflict markers

steps.action: Review the details of identified scheduling conflicts
steps.expectedResult: Each conflict displays detailed information including the conflicting shifts, affected employees, dates, times, and the nature of the conflict (e.g., double-booking, overlapping shifts)

steps.action: Verify the count of uncovered shifts and conflicts matches the actual data in the system
steps.expectedResult: The number of uncovered shifts and conflicts displayed in the report matches the actual count in the database with 100% accuracy

postconditions: Report accurately displays all uncovered shifts with clear highlighting
All scheduling conflicts are identified and highlighted
Report data is accurate and verifiable
User can easily distinguish between covered shifts, uncovered shifts, and conflicts
Report remains available for export or further review

storyTitle: As Scheduler, I want to receive notifications on schedule changes to achieve timely awareness

testCases.title: Receive notification on schedule modification
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
At least one employee exists in the system with an assigned schedule
Email notification service is configured and operational
In-app notification service is enabled
Employee has valid email address in their profile
Employee has email and in-app notifications enabled in preferences

steps.action: Navigate to the employee scheduling page
steps.expectedResult: Scheduling page loads successfully and displays list of employees and their current schedules

steps.action: Select an employee from the schedule list
steps.expectedResult: Employee's current schedule details are displayed including shift dates, times, and assigned positions

steps.action: Click the 'Edit Schedule' button for the selected employee
steps.expectedResult: Schedule editing form opens with current schedule information pre-populated

steps.action: Modify the schedule by changing the shift time from the original time to a new time (e.g., from 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM to 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM)
steps.expectedResult: New shift time is entered successfully in the form fields

steps.action: Click 'Save' or 'Update Schedule' button to confirm the modification
steps.expectedResult: Schedule is updated successfully in the system and a confirmation message is displayed. Notification trigger event is initiated

steps.action: Log in to the affected employee's email account and check the inbox
steps.expectedResult: Email notification about the schedule change is received within 2 minutes. Email subject line clearly indicates a schedule modification

steps.action: Open and review the email notification content
steps.expectedResult: Email contains accurate schedule details including employee name, previous shift time (9:00 AM - 5:00 PM), new shift time (10:00 AM - 6:00 PM), shift date, department, and the name of the scheduler who made the change

steps.action: Log in to the application as the affected employee and navigate to the notifications section or check the notification bell icon
steps.expectedResult: In-app notification indicator shows at least one unread notification

steps.action: Click on the notification bell icon or open the notifications panel
steps.expectedResult: In-app notification about the schedule change is displayed in the notification list with a timestamp

steps.action: Click on the schedule change notification to view full details
steps.expectedResult: Notification expands or opens to show complete schedule change information including employee name, previous shift time, new shift time, shift date, department, and scheduler name. All details match the email notification and actual schedule change

steps.action: Verify the accuracy of all notification content against the actual schedule modification made
steps.expectedResult: All information in both email and in-app notifications is 100% accurate and matches the schedule change made in step 4-5

postconditions: Employee schedule is successfully updated in the system
Email notification is delivered to employee's email address
In-app notification is visible in employee's notification center
Notification delivery status is logged in the system
Both notifications contain accurate and complete schedule change information
Notification is marked as unread until employee views it

testCases.title: Configure notification preferences
preconditions: User is logged in to the system
User has access to account settings or preferences section
Notification preferences feature is enabled in the system
User currently has default notification settings applied

steps.action: Navigate to the user profile or account settings page
steps.expectedResult: Account settings page loads successfully and displays navigation menu or tabs for various settings options

steps.action: Locate and click on 'Notification Settings' or 'Notification Preferences' menu item
steps.expectedResult: Notification settings page is displayed showing all available notification options including email notifications toggle, in-app notifications toggle, and notification types (schedule creation, modification, cancellation)

steps.action: Review the current state of email notification toggle (note whether it is enabled or disabled)
steps.expectedResult: Current email notification preference is clearly displayed with an ON/OFF toggle or checkbox

steps.action: Click the email notification toggle to change its state (if enabled, disable it; if disabled, enable it)
steps.expectedResult: Toggle switches to the opposite state with visual feedback (e.g., color change, position change)

steps.action: Review the current state of in-app notification toggle
steps.expectedResult: Current in-app notification preference is clearly displayed with an ON/OFF toggle or checkbox

steps.action: Click the in-app notification toggle to change its state
steps.expectedResult: Toggle switches to the opposite state with visual feedback

steps.action: Click the 'Save' or 'Update Preferences' button to save the changes
steps.expectedResult: Preferences are saved successfully and a confirmation message is displayed (e.g., 'Notification preferences updated successfully')

steps.action: Refresh the page or navigate away and return to the notification settings page
steps.expectedResult: Previously saved notification preferences are retained and displayed correctly, confirming that changes were persisted to the database

steps.action: As a Scheduler user, modify the current user's schedule to trigger a schedule change event
steps.expectedResult: Schedule is modified successfully in the system and notification trigger event is initiated

steps.action: If email notifications were ENABLED in step 4, check the user's email inbox. If DISABLED, verify no email is received
steps.expectedResult: Email notification is received only if email notifications were enabled in preferences. No email is received if disabled. Delivery matches the saved preference setting

steps.action: If in-app notifications were ENABLED in step 6, check the notification center in the application. If DISABLED, verify no in-app notification appears
steps.expectedResult: In-app notification appears only if in-app notifications were enabled in preferences. No in-app notification appears if disabled. Delivery matches the saved preference setting

steps.action: Verify that notifications are sent strictly according to the configured preferences
steps.expectedResult: Notification delivery behavior is 100% consistent with the saved preferences. Only enabled notification channels receive notifications, and disabled channels receive none

postconditions: User notification preferences are saved in the database
Email notification setting reflects user's choice
In-app notification setting reflects user's choice
Future notifications are sent only according to saved preferences
Preference changes are logged in the system
User remains on the notification settings page or is redirected to a confirmation page
